text:
Hi,
I have a MS Word 2000 document that has the trademark symbol in it.

I call the WordDocument's writealltext to get the text from the doc.

I get only the part of the data that is present before the TM symbol but not
the rest.

I tried with another symbol, omega. same result.
Also tried a doc with 5 or 6 TM symbols. same result.

please let me know of any fix or workarounds

thanks
creator: anandv@karna.com

text:
It looks we just had a patch that ought to fix this problem. Since there are no test cases here this issue is resolved.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 49908 ***
creator: dfisher@jmlafferty.com
